Title: arraySplit(func, arr1, ...)
Description: Split arr1 into multiple arrays. When func(arr1[i], ..., arrN[i]) returns something other than 0, the array will be split on the left hand side of the element. The array will not be split before the first element.
Examples: SELECT arraySplit((x, y) -> y, [1, 2, 3, 4, 5], [1, 0, 0, 1, 0]) AS res
